work.summary: Design of a framework for acquisition and analysis of distributed infrasound signals
Designed and implemented a suite of software for the aggregation, storage, and reporting of distributed power quality data.
Designed and implemented open source distributed power quality monitoring software.
highlights: Investigate protocols for communication between power quality monitoring equipment and backends
Identify power quality issues and inform users and the public
Design an interface for distributed power quality metrics consumption and reporting

work.summary: Designed and ran the ICS 211 lab
highlights: Teach a diverse set of students core building blocks of programming techniques and tools
Innovate using github to distribute classroom assignments and collect grades

work.summary: Assist in issues relating from IT to database entry
Developed software for batch processing of requests from NOAA’s Hysplit software package.
Developed, built, and maintained a computer cluster using COTS equipment.
Assisted in diagnosing and repairing students’ computer problems.

volunteer.summary: Tableau, Power BI, QlikView e Qlik Sense

awards.name: Desenvolver algoritmos associados a base de dados aplicando análises estatísticas e modelagem de dados preditivos que foram utilizados para aprofundar relacionamentos, fortalecer a longevidade e personalizar as interações com os clientes.
Analisar e processar conjuntos de dados complexos usando ferramentas avançadas de consulta, visualização e análise de dados.

references.name: Fornecer soluções orientadas a dados de problemas de negócios desafiadores.Cientista de dados de negócios com capacidade demonstrada para fornecer informações valiosas através de análise de dados e métodos avançados baseados em dados.
